title: Edho Oru Paatu(Male) Song Lyrics Unnidathil Ennai Koduthen
stanzas:
Edho Oru Paatu(Male) Song Lyrics Unnidathil Ennai Koduthen
#SARajkumar #Hariharan

Yedho oru paattu
en kadhil kaetkum
kaetkum podhellaam
un niyabagam thaalaattum (2)

en kangalin imaigalile
un niyabagam siragadikkum
naan swasikkum moochinile
un niyabagam kalandhirukkum
mmmmm....

niyabagangal mazhaiyaagum
niyabagangal kudaiyaagum
niyabagangal theemoottum
niyabagangal neer ootrum

Yedho oru paattu
en kadhil kaetkum
kaetkum podhellaam
un niyabagam thaalaattum

Kavidhai endrale
un peyarin niyabagame.
kaetkum isai ellaam
nee pesum niyabagame

adhirstam endrathum
undhan machcham niyabagam
azhagu endradhum
undhan moththam niyabagam

thendral endraale
un vaasal niyabagame
vasantham endraale
un varugai niyabagame

alaigal polave modhum
undhan niyabagam
marandhu ponadhe enakku
endhan niyabagam

Yedho oru paattu
en kadhil kaetkum
kaetkum podhellaam
un niyabagam thaalaattum (2)

en kangalin imaigalile
un niyabagam siragadikkum
naan swasikkum moochinile
un niyabagam kalandhirukkum
mmmmm....

niyabagangal mazhaiyaagum
niyabagangal kudaiyaagum
niyabagangal theemoottum
niyabagangal neer ootrum

Yedho oru paattu
en kadhil kaetkum
kaetkum podhellaam
un niyabagam thaalaattum
